title: Slack Integration Beta Launch
description: Anthropic launched Claude Code integration for Slack as a beta feature. Allows developers to delegate coding tasks directly from Slack threads by @ mentioning Claude. Can read Slack messages and generate code, enabling full coding workflows without switching tools.

community_feedback.quote: Claude Code in Slack signals shift to collaboration-first AI coding
This is a bigger deal than it sounds - developers can debug and generate code without switching tools

title: Browser Integration and Workflow Recording
description: New feature to run `/chrome` to test code directly in browser. Added workflow recording capabilities to teach Claude your workflows. Released as part of December 2025 feature updates.

title: Layout Customization and Stability Improvements (Version 2.3)
description: Holiday release focused entirely on fixing bugs and improving stability. Includes layout customization with four default layouts (agent, editor, zen, browser) that can be switched using Command+Option+Tab. Fixed 15 agent bugs and 11 layout bugs.

community_feedback.quote: This release isn't about new features, it's about directly pulling up stability by 15%

title: Visual Studio 2026 Integration with Cloud Agent Preview
description: GitHub shipped updates for Visual Studio 2026 (November update released December 3, 2025). Features include GitHub Cloud Agent Preview, Copilot Actions in context menus, Copilot Intent for setting development intent, performance improvements, and refreshed UX. Copilot extended beyond chat capabilities with deeper integration.

title: Wave 13: Merry Shipmas - Parallel Agents and Git Worktrees
description: Major release introducing first-class support for parallel multi-agent sessions, Git worktrees support for spawning multiple Cascade sessions without conflicts, side-by-side Cascade panes, dedicated terminal profile for reliable agent execution, and SWE-1.5 model available free for 3 months.

community_feedback.quote: Gemini 3 Flash is now available in Windsurf! Combines Pro-grade reasoning with Flash-level speed and efficiency

title: Gemini 3 Flash Available
description: Gemini 3 Flash model now available for all users. Combines Gemini 3 Pro-grade reasoning with Flash-level speed and efficiency. Achieves 78% on SWE-bench Verified benchmark, outperforming even Pro-tier models on key coding benchmarks.

community_feedback.quote: Impressed by the intelligence and speed - it even fixed an issue that GPT-5.1-codex couldn't. Highly efficient without sacrificing intelligence.
Extremely unhappy with Gemini 3 responses in Windsurf

title: Model Deprecation - codex-mini-latest Removed
description: OpenAI announced deprecation of codex-mini-latest model on November 17, 2025, with removal from API on January 16, 2026. The CLI and IDE Extension now default to gpt-5.1-codex-max for users signed in with ChatGPT.
